announcement.description: Announcement copy shown to users when the feature is introduced.

defaultEnabled.description: Whether this feature is enabled by default.

description.description: Short summary describing what the feature does.

displayName.description: User-facing display name shown in the experimental features UI.

enabled.description: Whether this feature is currently enabled in the loaded config.

flagName.description: Stable key used in config.toml and CLI flag toggles.

nextCursor.description: Opaque cursor to pass to the next call to continue after the last item. If None, there are no more items to return.
